templates.name: React Personal Portfolio Template + React Hooks

templates.description: Reactor – Personal Portfolio React Template is for many purpose. It’s a creative, minimal and Responsive design. This has been built with React (version : 17.0.2), ES6+, styled components, material ui, react-router-dom etc. This is created especially for those who want to build up his portfolio site. All files and code has been well organized and documented. It is easily customizable.
